mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_fl_user (leader, weichatname, weichatgroup, phone, fl_account, `role`, create_time, update_time) values (#{leader,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{weichatname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weichatgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update t_fl_user set leader = #{leader,jdbcType=INTEGER}, weichatname = #{weichatname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weichatgroup = #{weichatgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fl_account = #{flAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `role` = #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, leader, weichatname, weichatgroup, phone, fl_account, `role`, create_time, update_time from t_fl_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, leader, weichatname, weichatgroup, phone, fl_account, `role`, create_time, update_time from t_fl_user
